extendedInfo.description: Voting Card Michigan Politics is the perfect way to stay connected with Washington, D.C. policy and political developments, as well as, gain insight, breaking news, and facts.This interactive democracy app offers the following useful features:â¢ Countdown to the 2014 midterm elections;â¢ Up to the minute daily national political news for your party and state;â¢ Locate your U.S. Congressman (by zip code) or Senator (by state);â¢ Follow policy developments in Congress, including the latest U.S. House of Reps and Senate schedules, votes cast by Members of Congress, legislation, committee schedules, the White House and Supreme Court too; and,â¢ Access Republican political party news and websites; and,â¢ Use the gavel sound effect to preside over and conduct your own town hall meetings or hearings.
